posts.post_content:
Bud Sharpe / Shappe error variation.
$750 insured and delivered

Graded and ironically holdered by SGC
with error on flip regarding back brand.
Flip says Sweet Caporal but card is Piedmont.
SGC will re-holder for free but I like it the way
it is so have not re-submitted.
Card has been sold. Thanks everyone.
